name: Quosphere – A Technology Company
tagline: Helping you Disrupt and not be Disrupted
description:
Quosphere is a technology agnostic company headquartered in Mumbai, India and operating in 2 continents. As an award-winning partner to large enterprises, technology challengers and Fortune’s Global 500, Quosphere is committed to deliver the most advanced technology solutions in the shortest time.
With a decade long experience in the IT industry and a team of 150+ people, we specialize in transformative strategic consulting and offer domain centric solutions in the areas of Data Management, Business Intelligence, Robotic Process Automation, Advanced Analytics and Artificial Intelligence. Additionally, Quosphere invests in an independent R&D division of Data Scientists & RPA experts which is solely focused on developing the most innovative products and solutions that helps solve our client’s toughest data and process automation challenges.
 
Awards & Recognition
• Qlik Innovation Award 2018
• Qlik Presales of the Year 2018
• Salesforce Emerging Partner of the Year 2016
• Qlik Support Partner of the Year 2015
 
Our USP
1) Decade long experience in delivering multiple technology projects
2) Robust team of experts in disruptive technologies like Data Science, Analytics, RPA, ML, & AI
3) Expertise in cutting-edge technologies to deliver solutions to industries like manufacturing, IT, pharma, telecommunication, healthcare, & more
4) Seamless integration of BI & Self-Service tools, reducing dependency on IT, giving more power to you
5) Strong experience with a wide range of clients with in-depth understanding of business needs to provide custom solutions 
 
Technology Partners: Qlik, Automation Anywhere, Microsoft Power BI/Azure, MicroStrategy, Informatica, MapR, Talend, Salesforce
READ MORE...

locations.address: 1004, 10th Floor, Rupa Solitare, Millenium Business Park, Mahape
